app.description: Create and link a ticket from an existing one
app.name: Linked Ticket

ancestry_field.label: Reference Field
ancestry_field.helpText: Place a custom text field ID here to store the Linked Ticket reference data. Example : 2240041

child_tag.label: Child Tag
child_tag.helpText: This tag will be added to the created child ticket. Example : child_ticket

ajax_failure: An error occurred. Please try reloading the app.
ancestry_field_missing: Linked Ticket App: Did you follow the set up instructions and set up a custom field?
has_parent: This ticket has a parent ticket.
has_child: This ticket has a child ticket.
forbidden: You are not authorized to view this linked ticket.
closed_warn: The parent ticket is closed and cannot be modified. Only the child ticket will continue to contain a reference.
